title: Liam Hemsworth 'building new home' next door to Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson's love nest
text:
Liam Hemsworth is said to be 'building a new home' next door to estranged wife Miley Cyrus and her new boyfriend Cody Simpson's love nest in Malibu, California.

According to New Idea, the actor has continued renovations on the couple's former mansion, which burned down last year, alone, with Miley now living next door.

In the years before they got married in 2018, Miley and Liam had each bought one of the neighbouring properties, but lived together in the actor's larger mansion.

Awkward! Liam Hemsworth (L) is said to be 'building a new home' next door to estranged wife Miley Cyrus and boyfriend Cody Simpson's (R) love nest in Malibu, California

Liam first bought their sprawling Malibu estate in late 2014 from musician Matthew Wilder for $6.8million (USD) during a break from Miley.

In February 2016, the Wrecking Ball star went on to purchase the $2.5 million (USD) ranch next door, before later reuniting with Liam and permanently moving into his larger pad.

Liam's home then became their permanent base, where they lived with their pets, and Miley's property presumably remaining empty during this time.

Last November, the entire property, which Liam reportedly owns independently, was destroyed following one of the deadliest wildfires in California history.

Neighbours: According to New Idea, the actor is rebuilding the couple's former mansion (right), which burned down last year, as Miley continues to live next door with Cody (left)

History: Liam first bought their sprawling Malibu estate in late 2014 for $6.8M, with Miley buying the ranch next door for $2.5M. Pictured: Liam's home after it burnt down in 2018

According to reports, Miley and Liam obtained a permit to rebuild their home in July, but they split just weeks later before any renovation truly began.

Miley has since returned to her ranch next door, with new boyfriend Cody Simpson spending the majority of October shacked up there with her.

Liam is now said to be re-building his neighbouring mansion alone, while also reportedly searching for a home in Australia so he can live closer to brother Chris Hemsworth.

United: After reuniting in 2016, Liam's home became the former couple's permanent base, where they lived with their pets. Pictured: Miley's former recording studio at Liam's home

Speaking to New Idea on Monday, Cody's mother Angie revealed she will soon be flying to Los Angeles to spend time with her son and Miley.

She described the Cyrus family as 'truly humble people', and revealed she has known Miley's mother Tish for several years now.

'Cody and Alli [sister] worked on a few branding campaigns in the USA with Miley's sister Noah... we hit it off back then and have been friends ever since,' she explained.

Earlier this month, Liam was spotted on several dates with actress Maddison Brown.

Back to the ranch: Since splitting, Miley has returned to her ranch next door, with new boyfriend Cody Simpson (R) having spent the majority of October shacked up there with her
description: Liam Hemsworth is said to be 'building a new home' next door to estranged wife Miley Cyrus and boyfriend Cody Simpson's love nest in Malibu, California.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
